scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.db:push: cd apps/backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/backend && npx prisma db push --force-reset && npm run db:seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:up && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
